body:
Been a member of Avicus since late 2013. Though the administration team is the reason this server's shutting down, thank you everyone for the memories. 


RIP AVICUS 2011-2018
body_tagged:

title: Goodbye Avicus

replies.body: the administration did everything they were able to to keep the network running for so long. They are nowhere near the reason we shut down.
replies.body_tagged: the administration did everything they were able to to keep the network running for so long. They are nowhere near the reason we shut down.

replies.body:
If that's what you believe, ;)

Who cares, it was a good server while it lasted.
